meanings.sent1: The smokeable wood chips added a delicious flavor to the grilled meat.
meanings.sent2: The tobacco in the pipe was smokeable and gave off a pleasant aroma.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally used the smokeable cheese in the grilled cheese sandwich, and it tasted surprisingly good.
meanings.sent4: The chimney released smokeable clouds into the sky, creating a picturesque scene.
meanings.sent5: The smokeable herbs in the incense filled the room with a calming scent.

meanings.sent1: The smokeable cigar was enjoyed by the guests at the party.
meanings.sent2: The smokeable fish was seasoned perfectly and cooked over an open flame.
meanings.sent3: The smokeable jacket kept the smoker warm during the chilly evening.
meanings.sent4: The smokeable meat was tender and flavorful after hours in the smoker.
meanings.sent5: The smokeable pipe was carefully crafted from high-quality materials.
